channel.title: How to change charcter starting?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have a question, you c, all the time when someone new comes to my server, i give them cash and other items, i figured out how to change the starting equpment but after that i wan't to put 2147M and like 10 white party hats. How do i do that? Can someone tell me step by step, and what to find and what to type? Thx Owner of MinimiScape
[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 08:20:44 PM[/size][hr]also if anyone knows a tutorial, plz tell me, i really need this, cause i'm tired of just giving the stuff to every new player =)

item.title: How to change charcter starting?
item.dc:creator: @Minimi_Guard Minimi Guard
item.description:
@Minimi_Guard wrote:

ok thank you, when you are done plz post it here, i’m only a begginer at moparscape, but i already got A LOT DONE!!! I added more than 20shops, spawned npc, made stuff talk. But now this. So ye man thx, just post it to me when ur done.
Owner of Minimiscape[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 09:05:16 PM[/size][hr]o all right man, thx anyways =)[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 09:26:27 PM[/size][hr]DOES ANYONE ELSE KNOW HOW TO START A CHAR WITH ITEMS??

Read full topic
